miapi.arsenal.gemstone_melee.strength_on: Applies Strength effect when hitting a Entity
miapi.arsenal.gemstone_melee.unstable.de: When you kill an entity with this Weapon the entity will Explode
miapi.arsenal.gemstone_melee.radiant.des: Applies Poison and Glowing effect when hitting a Entity
miapi.arsenal.gemstone_melee.armoring.de: Applies Resistance effect on wielder when hitting a Entity
miapi.arsenal.gemstone_melee.lucky.descr: Applies Luck effect on wielder when hitting a Entity
Applies Speed effect on wielder when hitting a Entity

miapi.module.arsenal.handle.handheld.des: A Handle for Single hand small Weapons.
miapi.module.arsenal.handheld.katar.name: %s Katars
miapi.module.arsenal.handheld.katar.desc: A Small Dagger designed for swift, close-range combat.
miapi.module.arsenal.handheld.tonfa.name: %s Tonfa
miapi.module.arsenal.handheld.tonfa.desc: A Tonfa, great to stun opponents.
miapi.ability.heavy_attack.title: Heavy Attack
miapi.ability.heavy_attack.description:
Right Click to Heavy Attack
Dealing %s times the Damage and %s blocks of Range
Right click has to be held for %s seconds
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.dagger.name: %s Dagger
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.dagger.descri: A common blade head, often used by thieves and scoundrels.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.greatsword.de: A massive two-handed sword used for heavy strikes.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.zweihaender.d: A medieval german Blade, great for parrying and its thin blade can pierce armor.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.katana.name: %s Katana
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.katana.descri: A traditional Japanese sword known for its sharpness and precision, deals poorly with armor
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.longsword.des: A versatile and balanced sword that offers a good balance between speed and power and range.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.rapier.name: %s Rapier
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.rapier.descri: A slender and agile sword designed for piercing armor.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.normal.name: %s Sword
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.normal.descri: A classic and versatile sword used by warriors across various cultures.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.throwing_knif: A small and lightweight knife designed for throwing with accuracy.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.sickle.name: %s Sickle
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.sickle.descri: A small Sickle head. There might be some symbolism.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.scythe.name: %s Scythe
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.scythe.descri: A long Scythe head. Usually used to cut grass or People down
Tool Adapter to allow Tools to be stuck ontop of the handle
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.blocking.name: %s Large Guard
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.blocking.desc: A guard specifically designed for blocking.
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.katana.name: %s Katana Guard
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.katana.descri: A guard specifically designed for use with a katana sword.
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.normal.name: %s Normal Guard
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.normal.descri:
A standard guard suitable for most sword types.
Has increased durability.
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.slim.name: %s Slim Guard
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.slim.descript: A slender guard that reduces weight and allows for quicker strikes.
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.socket.name: %s Socket
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.socket.descri: A Guard that adds a Position to socket Magical Gemstones or Artifacts.
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.dual_socket.d: A Guard that adds a Position to socket two small Magical Gemstones or Artifacts.
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.winged.name: %s Winged Guard
miapi.module.arsenal.guard.winged.descri: A guard with decorative wing-like extensions for aesthetic appeal and improved balance.
miapi.module.arsenal.pommel.socket.name: %s Socket Pommel
miapi.module.arsenal.pommel.socket.descr: A pommel featuring a small Slot for a magical Gemstone.
miapi.module.arsenal.pommel.cross.name: %s Cross Pommel
miapi.module.arsenal.pommel.cross.descri: A pommel featuring a cross-shaped design for added grip and aesthetics.
miapi.module.arsenal.pommel.round.name: %s Round Pommel
miapi.module.arsenal.pommel.round.descri: A spherical pommel that provides a balanced weight distribution and comfortable grip.
miapi.module.arsenal.pommel.spike.name: %s Spike Pommel
miapi.module.arsenal.pommel.spike.descri: A pommel featuring a spike-like protrusion for increased piercing capability.
miapi.module.arsenal.handle.polearm.name: %s Polearm Handle
miapi.module.arsenal.handle.polearm.desc: A long handle suitable for polearm weapons, providing reach and leverage.
miapi.module.arsenal.handle.tool.name: %s Tool Handle
miapi.module.arsenal.handle.tool.descrip: A sturdy handle designed for tool-like weapons, offering durability and functionality.
miapi.module.arsenal.handle.sword.name: %s Normal Handle
miapi.module.arsenal.handle.sword.descri: A standard-sized handle suitable for most sword types.
miapi.module.arsenal.twin_blade.name: %s Twin Blade
miapi.module.arsenal.handle.twin.name: %s Twin Handle
miapi.module.arsenal.handle.twin.descrip:
Am impractical Twin Handle for Double the Blades.
 Looks cool though.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.axe_throwing.d: An axe primarily built to be thrown, can also be used as a Melee Weapon.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.axe_front.name: %s Axe
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.axe_front.desc: A front part of an axe used for cutting and stripping wood. Can also be used for combat.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.hammer.name: %s Hammer
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.hammer.descrip: A massive Hammer, can mine 3x3 Areas.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.axe_cutter.des: A Lumbermans Axe, can fell whole trees in a fells swoop.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.axe_back.name: %s Axe
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.axe_back.descr: A back part of an axe used for cutting and stripping wood. Can also be used for combat.
A front part of a pickaxe used for breaking and mining blocks.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.pickaxe_back.d: A back part of a pickaxe used for prying and chipping.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.shovel.name: %s Shovel
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.shovel.descrip: A tool with a broad scoop used for digging and moving earth.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.tool_back.name: %s Tool Butt
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.tool_back.desc: A back part of a tool used for balancing the weight of the tool head.
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.hoe_front.name: %s Hoe
miapi.module.arsenal.tool.hoe_front.desc: A front part of a hoe used for tilling soil.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.spear.name: %s Spear
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.spear.descrip: A front part of a spear used to stab people.
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.trident.name: %s Trident
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.trident.descr: A Trident Head, sometimes also called a Fork.
miapi.module.arsenal.mattock.name: %s Mattock
miapi.module.arsenal.blade.naginata.name: %s Naginata
miapi.arsenal.tree_mining.description: Amount of Logs mined at once
miapi.arsenal.compat.ht_treechop.descrip: Amount of Cuts done cutting down a tree
miapi.module.arsenal.arsenal_end_crystal: Highly unstable Crystal harnessed to explode killed Enemies
miapi.module.arsenal.arsenal_heart_of_th: Harnessing the Power of the Heart of the sea
miapi.module.arsenal.arsenal_nether_star: With the power of a Slain Wither you can Channel its hatred to slay one specific Target
miapi.module.arsenal.arsenal_ender_pearl: Using the Power of the Enderpearl using Spatial Interdiction to block Teleporting
miapi.module.arsenal.arsenal_ender_eye_m: Using the Ender Eye you can track your opponents for a short bit
miapi.module.arsenal.arsenal_conduit_med: Harnessing the power of a Conduit in a Item
